name: Dodge Bomb
description:
Dodge Bomb is a fast-paced couch competition that pits you and up to three friends against each other in short intense matches of explosive multiplayer mayhem!

Dodge, dip and dash around bombs, robots and obstacles as you fight to determine which of your friends has the best bombot skills!

-----

Dodge Bomb was developed by Birdbrain Games. This team of 6 undergraduate UOIT students developed the game engine and all assets across a 6 month period.

Thank you for playing, we hope you enjoy!

-----

Note: Dodge Bomb currently plays on Windows only, and requires a Windows compatible gamepad to play.
